description: A very lively girl in the same year as Amu and a member of the volleyball club. For some reason she calls Amu by her full name. Misaki is in love with Tadase, but Saaya tells her that Tadase doesn`t like energetic girls. When Misaki hears Tadase talking about his character transformation and how he "doesn`t like all that energy" she misunderstands, and a X Chara is born. After Amu heals the egg, Misaki meets Kuukai and falls in love with him too.
name: Watarai Misaki
